item.title: Appveyor
item.description: Appveyor ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾çº¿ä¸Š CICD å·¥å…·ã€‚ Support Contexts: Windows (Default) Ubuntu MacOS Support Languages: Node.js io.js Xamarin Python Ruby C++ Go Ruby version:1.0.{build}-{branch}skip_commits:files:- 'azure-pipelines.yml'- 'README.md'install:- set PATH=C:\Ruby26-x64\bin;%PATH%- bundle installbuild:offbefore_test:- ruby -v- gem -v- bundle -vtest_script:- rails db:migrate RAILS_ENV=testAppveyor.yml Reference # Notes:# - Minimal appveyor.yml file is an empty file.
